title: Kamichama Karin, Vol. 1
description: Karin is an average girl--at best. She's not good at sports and gets terrible grades. On top of all that, her parents are dead and her beloved cat Shi-chan just died, too. She is miserable--but everything is about to change. Little does Karin know that her mother's ring has the power to make her a goddess!"--Cover, p. [4], v, 1.
author: Koge-Donbo*
